ingredients: 1 large white onion, peeled and finely diced
3 cloves of garlic, peeled and finely sliced
2 thumb-sized pieces of ginger, grated (leave the skin on)
1 tsp cumin seeds, toasted and ground
1 tsp coriander seeds, toasted and ground
25 or so curry leaves (I buy mine fresh in bulk and freeze)
2 whole peeled plum tomatoes (tinned is fine)
